from DDC_TASK
order by ${orderByClause}

mapper.update:
update DDC_TASK
TASK_ID = #{record.taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TASK_NAME = #{record.taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_ID = #{record.appId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
APP_KEY = #{record.appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_CATEGOTY = #{record.taskCategoty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TASK_TYPE = #{record.taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TASK_IMPLEMENT_TYPE = #{record.taskImplementType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLASS_NAME = #{record.className,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAMETERS = #{record.parameters,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_LIMIT = #{record.dataLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TIMEOUT = #{record.timeout,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TIMEOUT_RETRY = #{record.timeoutRetry,jdbcType=BIT},
TIMEOUT_RETRY_TIMES = #{record.timeoutRetryTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FAILED_RETRY = #{record.failedRetry,jdbcType=BIT},
FAILED_RETRY_TIMES = #{record.failedRetryTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FAILED_RETRY_INTERVAL = #{record.failedRetryInterval,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CONCURRENCY = #{record.concurrency,jdbcType=BIT},
MUTITHREAD = #{record.mutithread,jdbcType=BIT},
THREADS = #{record.threads,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TASK_STATUS = #{record.taskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CRON = #{record.cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAIT_TIME = #{record.waitTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OWNER = #{record.owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORKFLOW_ID = #{record.workflowId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{record.updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_EXECUTE_START_TIME = #{record.lastExecuteStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_EXECUTE_END_TIME = #{record.lastExecuteEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_EXECUTE_IP = #{record.lastExecuteIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_EXECUTE_PORT = #{record.lastExecutePort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_EXECUTE_NODE_CODE = #{record.lastExecuteNodeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_EXECUTE_STATUS = #{record.lastExecuteStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_EXECUTE_MESSAGE = #{record.lastExecuteMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update DDC_TASK
TASK_NAME = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
APP_KEY = #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TASK_CATEGOTY = #{taskCategoty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TASK_TYPE = #{taskType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TASK_IMPLEMENT_TYPE = #{taskImplementType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLASS_NAME = #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARAMETERS = #{parameters,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_LIMIT = #{dataLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TIMEOUT = #{timeout,jdbcType=BIGINT},
TIMEOUT_RETRY = #{timeoutRetry,jdbcType=BIT},
TIMEOUT_RETRY_TIMES = #{timeoutRetryTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FAILED_RETRY = #{failedRetry,jdbcType=BIT},
FAILED_RETRY_TIMES = #{failedRetryTimes,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FAILED_RETRY_INTERVAL = #{failedRetryInterval,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CONCURRENCY = #{concurrency,jdbcType=BIT},
MUTITHREAD = #{mutithread,jdbcType=BIT},
THREADS = #{threads,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TASK_STATUS = #{taskStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CRON = #{cron,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WAIT_TIME = #{waitTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OWNER = #{owner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORKFLOW_ID = #{workflowId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_EXECUTE_START_TIME = #{lastExecuteStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_EXECUTE_END_TIME = #{lastExecuteEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_EXECUTE_IP = #{lastExecuteIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_EXECUTE_PORT = #{lastExecutePort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_EXECUTE_NODE_CODE = #{lastExecuteNodeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_EXECUTE_STATUS = #{lastExecuteStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_EXECUTE_MESSAGE = #{lastExecuteMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TASK_ID = #{taskId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
